title: Coronavirus: Timeline
description: The Defense Department is responding to every development in the COVID-19 pandemic and remains focused on protecting our people, safeguarding our missions and supporting the American people.
cleaned_text: DOD replaces its "Travel Restrictions: Locations" releases with installation status updates. The previous format listed U.S. states, districts, and territories, and host nations which meet the conditions outlined in the Secretary of Defense's May 22 memo on moving to a conditions-based, phased approach to personnel movement and travel. The new format lists the status of travel restrictions for DOD Installation, facilities, and locations with greater than 1,000 DOD personnel assigned. Weekly updates will be posted on the [ releases page](/Newsroom/releases/) of Defense.gov.
